description: This slim little firearm can be hidden anywhere.
Small yet effiecient. Has a nasty kickback though.
What it lacks in size it makes up in…actually nevermind, this gun is cheap for a reason.
Sure to "light" up any party, heh heh heh.
The ammo magazine actually works like a second barrel. Neat!
A gun perfect for atomizing your foes, leaving no evidence behind.
Your dream of shooting a laser from your hand can now come true!
A pecuiliar gun. Holding the trigger actually charges up a powerful blast. Its effectiveness is questionable in a battle though.
Used by Space Sheriffs all over the galaxy, this gun can be utilized by desperados as wells.
Sneaky gun, this one. It looks like a space wrench at first, but little do your enemies know it can pack some heat.
